Main: ^(Maybe I should look here--wait. Is that...)
Say_something2: ^"I was looking all over this park for you. Come on out, please."
I_see_you: ^"I see you, you know. You aren't being really slick."
Persuade: ^(She isn't coming out. What should I do...?)
Reason: ^"You know our manager is going to come for our throats if you don't come out. Even if the concert is over, you still have fans to meet backstage..."
Comfort: ^"Every performer makes mistakes, but you have our group members and me to support you through everything. I promise you nobody even noticed it."
Joke: ^"If you don't come out, I'm gonna look REAL DUMB talking to a trash can. I've talked to a lot of inanimate objects, thanks to you. But I did it because...I care."
Alpha_comfort: ^"Out of all of us, you work the hardest. Everyone knows that. Fans know that. There's no need to hide--you're a fantastic performer. Be proud of that. And whatever happens, we can get through together, ok?"
Music_critic: ^TRASH CAN (?): "But...people think our music is...too different. Weird. I can't stop thinking it everytime we perform."
^Tell her that art is meant to challenge
Advice: ^"For every bad review, we have 100 good ones. Artists are constantly evolving. Music is vastly different. We can't please everyone--but who says we're trying to? All that matters is that we like what we make."
Art: ^"Remember when we were trainees, we hoped to bring something new and exciting to the industry? This is exactly that. Art is meant to challenge conventio. We take risks no other artist would dare. Give us some more credit."
Dunk: ^"Ugh, don't listen to those idiots! Let them say what they want. They aren't the ones that take risks--they have the advantage of safety. We don't play it safe. That's why people love us. We need more of that."
Insecure: ^TRASH CAN: "I don't know. I just feel so...bad at this. Like every mistake is a sign I should just stop. I'm a Big Mistake made up of lots of Little Mistakes. What's the point of trying if I'm no good?"
^Tell her she is not a mistake
Ult_comfort: ^"Do you know how proud I am that I get to work with a talented, funny, awesome person? You bring people together. That's something special. I wish you could see yourself the way other people do."
See_yourself: ^"So please be kinder to yourself. I don't appreciate it when people talk badly about my best friend."
Wow: ^TRASH CAN: "...I think that's the nicest thing anyone's ever said to me."
Deny: ^"You literally could not be more wrong. I've seen what your fans say. The chants...the posters...the memes. I could probably learn a thing or two..."
Accept: ^"This is probably the nicest I've ever been to someone in my life. You're very welcome."
Bday: ^TRASH CAN: "Wow, is it my birthday? Haha..."
Thanks: ^TRASH CAN: "But seriously, thanks. I...I really needed that. I think I'm really lucky to have you."
Lucky: ^"Yeah. You ARE lucky to have me. I had to fanservice my way through several fans--don't ask--and risked my life running away from our manager."
Complain: ^"Do you know how many fans I had to fight to find you? Let's just say I won't be doing any fanservice for a REALLY LONG TIME..."
Cheese: ^"Yeah, yeah. Kumbaya and junk. This feels gross...might be remnants of the fanservice I had to weaponize against our fans. Let's cut it out before I start feeling again."
A_sight_to_behold: ^TRASH CAN: "WHAT?! And you're telling me I MISSED all of this? Wow...I should run away more often!"
Come_out1: ^"If you do, I'm calling the police. I'll mobilize the fans. Don't try me."
Come_out2: ^"So...are you ready to come out now?"
Hug: ^TRASH CAN: "Yeah! And when I do, I'm going to give you the biggest hug."
Whatever: ^"...Damn. The feelings are back. If you do, I guess I won't stop you."
